resources.string: All the messages will also be permanently deleted from both your and the other party’s devices.
Block this user from messaging and calling you on %s?
Operation denied.You need to unblock this contact.
This account has logged out and messages can not be reached.
This account has been disabled and messages can not be reached.
Operation denied. This account is already unregistered.
You can only send up to 3 messages per day to a user who is not your friend. Please wait for the other party to accept your request.
You removed %s. All the messages have been deleted.
The user is not in your contact list!
Swipe left to read, swipe right to turn pages.
The request failed. Please try again
This device has been logged out. Your account may have been logged in on another device. Tap to re-login.
Group name must less than or equal 64 chars.
You have an emergency case, please contact %s
The maximum recording file size is 10M
Really want to delete this message?
Leaving this group will delete all its data from your device.

After turning on the switch, group members can freely chat privately with EXT members.\nAfter turning off the switch, the permission will not be revoked immediately, but will need to be delayed for up to 7 days.
Start or join a group meeting now?
%1$s have been removed from the group.
The group has been disbanded and all members have been removed, all meetings have been canceled.
The group has been disbanded and all members have been removed, all meetings have been canceled.
%1$s invited you to \"%2$s\", click to join the group.\nchative://group/join?inviteCode=%3$s
No permission, please contact the group moderators.
%1$s are not your friend yet, you cannot invite them to join a group. Please ask them to accept you first.
Must select more than 1 member to create a group.
This group has been set to allow everyone to speak.
This group has been set to only moderators can speak.
Select %1$s as the new group owner? You will automatically give up ownership
%1$s has been removed as a group moderator
The message history on your device and your friend\'s device will be cleared, and if you have other devices, they will be logged out and you will need to relink.
%1$s reset the identity key and the history messages were cleared.
All messages will be deleted for security.
No email or phone linked, continuing will delete your account.
Are you sure you want to log out?
Your account, along with all data including contacts, groups, and messages, will be automatically deleted after 90 days of inactivity. You can re-register at any time if you need.
This will completely delete all your data on both client and server, such as your profile, contacts, and messages, and they will never be recovered.
To confirm, please enter %1$s in the box below.
Your account will be permanently delete.
Automatically save received photos and videos to Photos; items won’t be saved in Confidential Mode.
Leave your mark with a personalized signature
Not supported link. Please upgrade the client and try again.
The number you dialed is incomplete
Invite you to a voice call
Are you sure you want to recall message?
Device does not support picture-in-picture mode
Camera service is not available, Please try again later!
Invite with this QR or link
Enter a code to add a new friend
The old invite code will expire. Are you sure to continue?
%1$s invited you to \"%2$s\", click to join the group: %3$s
Failed to join the group. This group disabled invite link.
Failed to join the group. This group only allows moderators to invite.
Failed to join the group. This group has already been disbanded.
Failed to join the group. This group is invalid.
This group only allows moderators to invite.
This device will be able to see your groups and contacts, read all your messages, and send messages in your name.
You are already on a call
You cannot call %s because of their privacy settings.
Sorry, the selected file exceeds the 200MB limit and cannot be sent.
All the messages have been deleted.
Tap and hold to record a voice message, release to send
The application you have currently installed is an unofficial signed application, please confirm.
Your current device is emulator, which may cause the application functions not to work properly or cause security risks, please confirm.
Your current device has been rooted, and there is a risk that application data may be stolen by third-party application, please confirm.
Not sure if this link is safe. Are you sure to open it?\n
Send invitation to the chat room
When unchecked, only creator (host) can invite others.
When unchecked, only creator (host) and group moderators can invite others.
Only creator (host) can modify by default.
Only creator (host) can modify by default.

The meeting is scheduled from a group. Attendees include group members and invited contact memebers. When someone joins the group, the meeting will automatically add the new one; when someone leaves the group, the meeting will automatically remove this person.

You can receive 3 notifications from MeetingBot
1. Reminder 10 mins before the meeting
2. Meeting bar at the top of chat list 5 mins before the meeting
3. Pop-up when the meeting starts

You can receive 3 notifications from MeetingBot
1.Reminder 10 mins before the live stream
2. Meeting bar at the top of chat list 5 mins before the live stream
3. Pop-up when the live stream starts
Cancel this meeting for all attendees
Cancel this event for all attendees
Cancel the recurring meetings for all attendees
Cancel the recurring events for all attendees
No meetings in the next 14 days
Attendees will auto change as group members change
When someone joins the group, the meeting will add the new one and when someone leaves, the meeting will also remove this person.
There is already a meeting at the time. Are you sure to continue?
There is already a meeting FROM THIS GROUP at the time. Are you sure to continue?
Application has no permission to show notifications. You can enable it in system settings..
Please allow %s to send you notification to stay informed with the messages and meetings.
"Do not disturb" is turned on. You may not receive notifications.
Google services are restricted on your device. Please keep background connection enabled to receive messages and calls.
Notification settings page not available on this device
Receive notification only when you have been mentioned.
Change default notification setting with \"Me/Notifications/Default Group Setting\".
Urgent: Please answer the call now.
Application has no permission for video and voice. You can enable camera and microphone permissions in app permissions settings of the system settings.
Application has no permission for voice. You can enable microphone permissions in app permissions settings of the system settings.
Application has no permission for camera. You can enable camera permission in the application permission settings of the system settings.
Application has no permission for access picture media files. You can enable image or storage access permission in the application permission settings of the system settings.
Network error. Please try again later.
Unable to join the meeting at this time, please try again later.
You requested to speak, waiting for host approval.
One or more items were too large
One or more items were invalid
You\'ll lose any changes you\'ve made to this photo.
Error while saving attachment to storage!

plurals.name: ConversationFragment_saving_n_media_to_storage_warning
plurals.item: Saving this media to storage will allow any other apps on your device to access it.\n\nContinue?
Saving all %1$d media to storage will allow any other apps on your device to access them.\n\nContinue?

resources.string: New: Blur faces or draw anywhere to blur
Draw to blur additional faces or areas
Are you there？ LEAVE THE MEETING due to no one speaks for a long time.
invites you to join the voice call
There is a call in progress. You can answer the call after disconnecting the current call.
Please allow %s to run in the background to stay informed with the messages and meetings.
Due to prolonged inactivity, your device has been temporarily disabled for security reasons, and any unreceived messages have been cleared. Please activate your device to resume use.
Keep a low-impact background connection to Yelling for reliable notifications. Before enabling, please ensure the above settings are in normal status.
Please ensure the following settings are in normal status before enabling background connection
To avoid missing important alerts, please enable background operation.
The following messages will be deleted within %1$s after being read.
Messages will expire after being read, they will GONE and then can NOT be viewed in any way.
The data of this group will be deleted and all of the members in this group will be removed at the same time.
Operation denied.You are not friend yet.
Allow %s to access and enable the “Do Not Disturb” permission (sometimes called “Mode access” permission).
Previously deleted messages can’t be recovered.
More messages may be deleted and won’t be recoverable. This change applies to all your devices.
Earlier messages are no longer available
